costartcolony.description: Start your Colony! Get your plot of land and your bank account!

coinvite.description: Get the link to invite ColonyMarsBot to any server

coserver.description: Get the link to the official bot server

cobase.description: Get a visual representation of your Mars Colony

coshop.description: See all the available buildings in the shop

coremove.description: Break a building down to its scraps!

cobank.description: See what you have in your bank account

codaily.description: Get your daily package of sponsored funds every day!

cocommands.description: You already know, you're here lmao XD

cocolonize.description: Get humans to come onto your planet, but it won't be easy, they are needy...

coquests.description: Check and update your quests/quest lines, this is an important command

comine.description: Mine some rocks with the Earth Mine every three hour or so

corefine.description: Refine your rocks into new more useful products and ores

coinventory.description: Look at the materials you have, in the storage facility

coerror.description: Some problem with the bot? Send coerror along with your error message!

cofeedback.description: Please help the bot grow! Give us some feedback with this command

coworkshop.description: Check out the technology you can create from materials

cocraft.description: You got the workshop, put it to good use! Craft numerous different machine parts

cotrade_terminal.description: See the intergalactic product market prices as well as sell your products

cospy.description: Perform extreme espionage upon your enemies, construct the espionage embassy and get some spies

coresearch_station.description: Dwelve into the world of science and research, explore targets of scrutinous research

colaunchpad.description: Operate and send back arrived ships

coexpeditions.description: Send and recieve expeditions through the expedition hut
